abstract: The change in leadership amounts to a shift upward for the entire top management team at the network.
snippet: The change in leadership amounts to a shift upward for the entire top management team at the network.
lead_paragraph: 5:21 p.m. | Updated HBO announced a transition in its top management on Thursday, elevating Richard Plepler to the role of chief executive, replacing Bill Nelson, who will step down at the end of the year.

headline.main: HBO Names Plepler as Chief and Promotes Top Managers
headline.print_headline: HBO Names Plepler as Chief And Promotes Top Managers
